title: New React v18 index
note: The new way to do root in index.(tsx|ts|js|jsx)

title: React-Router-Dom HashRouter Way
pre:
<HashRouter>
	<Routes>
		<Route path='/' element={</>}/>
		<Route index element={</>}/>
		<Route path="*" element={</>}/>
	</Routes>
</HashRouter>
note: Webpack doesn't like BrowserRouter so I use this with webpack. index element means default on page load. * means a bad route.

title: React-Router-Dom BrowserRouter Way
pre:
<BrowserRouter>
	<Routes>
		<Route path='/' element={</>}/>
		<Route index element={</>}/>
		<Route path="*" element={</>}/>
	</Routes>
</BrowserRouter>
note: This is the standard way without webpack.
